column4: Hi, anyone got any tips on how i might get my maxtor mini III external hard drive (usb) working on ubuntu (I've just loaded 7.04). it had worked fine on windows and ive checked i'd shut the ehd properly
try mounting it manyally from the terminal,   see if any error messages show up.
check google for 'mount drives linux'  how to mount things manually id well worth learning.
im leaving for work soon so cant walk ya throuhg it.  in short. 'sudo mount /dev/Devicename /media/DIRECTORYNAMETHATMUSTEXIST  options_here'
